name: Research Data Collection Platform
description: Multi-sensor mobile platform for field research with fleet coordination, structured logging, and Gemini Robotics ER for autonomous navigation
author: dr_fieldbot
use_case: Fleet of 3 robots collecting environmental data across a university research meadow. Each robot covers a grid section, logging GPS-tagged photos, air quality readings (BME680), ambient sound levels, and ground cover classification. Data syncs to a central server for analysis. Gemini Robotics ER handles autonomous waypoint navigation.
